TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SyncFromAllServersEvent extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Used in the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncUpdateCallback"> delegate to specify the type of synchronization event.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersEvent Error = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersEvent Finished = int32(3)

Docs.summary: The entire replication process has completed.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersEvent SyncCompleted = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Synchronization of two servers has just completed.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersEvent SyncStarted = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Synchronization of two servers has started.
